flawed_nl_solution:
Marcel bought 10 ears of corn and Dale bought 1/2 what Marcel did, 10 x 1/2 = 10/2 = <<10*1/2=20/1>>20/1 ears of corn that Dale bought.
Together, Marcel and Dale bought 10 + 20/1 = <<10+20/1=30>>30 ears of corn, or 30 vegetables.
The rest of the vegetables are potatoes, 27 vegetables - 30 ears of corn = <<27-30=-3>>-3 potatoes.
Dale bought 8, so Marcel bought -3 - 8 = <<-3-8=-11>>-11 potatoes.
#### -11

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 5, not 20/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
